name: PJSC Myronivsky Hliboproduct
goal: MHP holds an indisputable leading position in the Ukrainian meat market. Strong growth across all business streams is company's strategic goal. PJSC MHP is dynamic and fast-growing Ukrainian company, based on the unique model of vertical integration. The company is leader in the agrarian market in poultry segment and is constantly increasing poultry production capacity in Ukraine. Its enterprises are built and equipped with cutting edge technologies and employees have the unique knowledge and experience in the industry. The basis of company's success are workers, investment, business model, management skills and leading technologies.
interests: Agriculture, Customs, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, Trade
euInitiatives: MHP exports poultry products to the EU. It is interested in the EU’s trade and neighborhood policies. It is also interested in the EU’s food safety regime.
